chart.title: Diabetes prevalence
chart.subtitle: The share of people aged 20-79 who have [diabetes](#dod:diabetes). Diabetes is a [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor) for chronic complications, including cardiovascular disease, and premature death.
chart.citation: International Diabetes Federation, via World Bank (2025)
